amendment.description: To set aside an amount for a grant to Rocky Mountain College, Montana, for the purchase of aircraft for support of aviation training.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3490 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3490 proposed by Senator Stevens for Senator Baucus. (consideration: CR S7366-7367; text: CR S7367) To set aside an amount for a grant to Rocky Mountain College, Montana, for the purchase of aircraft for support of aviation training.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3490 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3490 proposed by Senator Stevens for Senator Baucus.
